definitions.text: be too tight; rub or press
examples: This neckband is choking the cat

definitions.text: tie a gag around someone's mouth in order to silence them
examples: The burglars gagged the home owner and tied him to a chair
The students were gagging during dinner

definitions.text: struggle for breath; have insufficient oxygen intake
examples: he swallowed a fishbone and gagged

definitions.text: make an unsuccessful effort to vomit; strain to vomit
